001/**  
002 * This controller provides functionality for removing an employee
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import javafx.fxml.FXML;
008import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
009import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
010import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
011import javafx.scene.Node;
012import javafx.scene.Parent;
013import javafx.scene.Scene;
014import javafx.stage.Stage;
015import javafx.event.Event;
016import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
017import src.database.db_connect;
018import java.sql.*;
019
020import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
021import static src.controller.useful_functions.set_current_name;
022import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
023
024import java.io.File;
025import java.io.IOException;
026
027import src.model.employee;
028
029/**
030 * This class provides functionality for removing an employee
031 */
032public class remove_employee_controller {
033
034    /** Text field for the name of the employee to be removed */
035    @FXML
036    private TextField full_name_field;
037    
038    /**
039     * This function attempts to remove the employee after the user hits enter
040     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called 
041     */
042    @FXML 
043    private void handle_enter(ActionEvent event) {
044        String name = full_name_field.getText() == null ? "" : full_name_field.getText().trim();
045
046        // error handling if there is no entry
047        if (name.isEmpty()) {
048            return;
049        }
050
051        // commit new employee to the database
052        try (Connection conn = db_connect.getConnection()) {
053            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
054
055            PreparedStatement checkStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT employeename FROM employee WHERE employeename = ?");
056            checkStmt.setString(1, name);
057 
058            ResultSet rs = checkStmt.executeQuery();
059            if (rs.next()) {
060                PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("DELETE FROM employee WHERE employeename = ? RETURNING employeeid");
061                insertStmt.setString(1, name);
062                ResultSet rs1 = insertStmt.executeQuery();
063                
064                if (rs1.next()) {
065                  System.out.println("Employee removed sucessfully");
066                }
067                else{
068                    System.out.println("Could not remove employee");
069                }
070            }
071            else {
072                System.out.println("Employee could not be removed.");
073            }
074
075            conn.commit();
076            System.out.println("Employee removal committed.");
077        }
078        catch (SQLException e) {
079            e.printStackTrace();
080        }
081    }
082
083
084    /**
085     * This function switches back to the main employee data page
086     * @param event - Input trigger which calls the function after the back button is clicked
087     */
088    @FXML
089    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
090        switch_scene("GUI/employee_data.fxml", event);
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * This function clears all the text fields when this page opens
095     */
096    @FXML
097    public void initialize() {
098        // If the page ever re-opens with old text, clear it here
099        if (full_name_field != null) full_name_field.clear();
100    }
101}
